Description.Text:
Property Location
Centrally located in Santander, NH Ciudad de Santander is minutes from Plaza Porticada and Palace of Festivals of Cantabria. This hotel is within close proximity of University of Cantabria and Santander Cathedral.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 62 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with onsite massages or make use of the other amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Additional features include wedding services and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of NH Ciudad de Santander. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of NH Ciudad de Santander. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Centrally located in Santander, NH Ciudad de Santander is minutes from Plaza Porticada and Palace of Festivals of Cantabria. This hotel is within close proximity of University of Cantabria and Santander Cathedral.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Plaza Porticada - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Palace of Festivals of Cantabria - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
University of Cantabria - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Santander Cathedral - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Santander Ferry Terminal - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
El Sardinero Stadium - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
El Sardinero Beach - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Camello Beach - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Magdalena Beach - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Palacio de la Magdalena - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Somo Beach - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Loredo Beach - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Langre Beach - 8.5 km / 5.3 mi
Cabarceno Natural Park - 13.5 km / 8.4 mi
Las Monedas Caves - 23.6 km / 14.7 mi

The preferred airport for NH Ciudad de Santander is Santander (SDR) - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.

Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
